sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.
Speak to Alicia about any strange sightings.
Return to the Gate Guard with your findings.

rogue_tomato.name: The Rogue Tomato
rogue_tomato.description: A mutated tomato is terrorizing the desert. Slay it and bring back the Galbana Lily it stole.

the_sun_scorched_wolf.name: The Sun-Scorched Wolf
the_sun_scorched_wolf.description: A wolf pack leader is attacking travelers. Bring back its pelt as proof.

desert_rose.name: Desert Rose
desert_rose.description: A scholar needs a rare Desert Rose for research.
objectives: Find the Desert Rose in the sands.

wraith_of_sewers.name: Wraith of the Sewers
wraith_of_sewers.description: A ghost haunts the waterways. Put it to rest.

flowering_cactoid.name: Flowering Cactoid
flowering_cactoid.description: A Cactoid with a rare flower has been spotted.

nidhogg.name: Nidhogg
nidhogg.description: A serpent has shed its skin, indicating it is ready to hunt. Slay it first.

rock_tortoise.name: Rock Tortoise
rock_tortoise.description: A giant tortoise is blocking the trade route. Its shell is valuable.

dustia.name: Dustia
dustia.description: An ancient skeleton holds a forbidden tome. Reclaim it.

ring_wyrm.name: Ring Wyrm
ring_wyrm.description: A dragon's scale is needed for a legendary armor.

malboro_menace.name: Malboro Menace
malboro_menace.description: The smell is unbearable. End it.

white_mousse.name: White Mousse
white_mousse.description: A slime has swallowed the key to the sluice gates.

gil_snapper.name: Gil Snapper
gil_snapper.description: Rumors say this turtle guarded a lost fortune.

antlion_infestation.name: Antlion Infestation
antlion_infestation.description: The mines are overrun. The leader holds an amber crystal.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.description: Don't let the name fool you. It's a monster.
